author: Jake Edmiston
title: Sobeys parent company will hire laid-off staff from Cineplex and others to bolster labour force
description: Supermarkets are looking to reinforce their staffing levels as well as provide a stop gap should employees need to stay home after contact with the coronavirus
content:
One of the biggest grocers in Canada is looking to relieve pressure on its frontline staff by hiring people laid off from Cineplex Inc. and Freshii Inc. restaurants during the COVID-19 crisis.
Empire Co. Ltd., the owner of supermarket chains Sobeys, Safeway … [+5534 chars]
